FrequentlyAskedQuestions.question: What is a property?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: A building or a open plot under the usage of residential or non-residential purposes are considered as property.

FrequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Why ULBs levy property taxes?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: ULBs perform certain obligatory functions in its boundary limit and need money to carry out those functions hence the body levy the tax on buildings and open plots.

FrequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Why we as property owners should pay it?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: We should pay the property tax timely to enable the ULB to keep the city neat and clean, perform maintenance work and other functions.
